description:
Diffusion MRI utilities in python. DIPY is the paragon 3D/4D+ imaging
library in Python. Contains generic methods for spatial normalization,
signal processing, machine learning, statistical analysis and
visualization of medical images. Additionally, it contains specialized
methods for computational anatomy including diffusion, perfusion and
structural imaging.
name: py-dipy

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
